snippet.title: Swordswallower Incubator Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the free demo here! https://utiazulay.itch.io/swordswallower
Follow us for updates: https://twitter.com/swsw_game


Swordswallower is an experimental platformer where you play as a girl who drags around a gigantic sword. The player can’t jump, instead launching their sword into the environment and pulling themselves toward it with deadly speed.

We're a two-dev team currently working on the game full-time and aim to release it in 2022.
